additionalType: ecrro:****type***** have to sort out abbreviations and context lookups for opaque ecrro URIs
name: text
description: Put description of the resource here, and remove this note. This resource type is not restricted only to source code, but the sdo type is included to use properties on the sdo:softwareSourceCode type
datePublished: [A date value in ISO 8601 date format]

license.name: use if creativeWork
license.url: use if CreativeWork or URL; if use url, the value is a string

isRelatedTo.name: relationship label here [this is an alternate way to represent related resources with some relationship semantics

additionalProperty.value: URI identifying the publication, or foaf:Document?

featureList.description: list of functions implemented by the software; use function categories from SoftwareFunction in SWO or SoftwareFunctionCategory TopLevel or SoftwareFunction Subcategories in the ECRR workgroup draft information model google workbook https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1jFGjp2_QRT1z2YR4DJZwA-OTaj41zpdkUiX_JxBoISU/edit#gid=1171223126
name: array
of
function
labels

eccro:inputConformsTo: list of mime types or ecrr sourceProfile tokens
eccro:algorithm: list of identifiers for algorithm implemented by software application
eccro:outputConformsTo: list of mime types or ecrr sourceProfile tokens
runtimePlatform: list of execution environments, e.g. operating system, hardware
programmingLanguage: list of programming languages used for software implementation
codeRepository: URL for repository where source code is managed
eccro:applicationInterface: list of interface identifiers from ecrr that are used to interact with the application
installURL: url for installer package, or to web resource with links to installer packages
hasPart: list of sdo:Text or sdo:URL; or sdo:CreativeWork
